t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    ans = input()
    chef = input()
    wrong = False
    points = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if wrong or chef[i] == 'N':
            wrong = False
            continue
        if chef[i] == ans[i]:
            wrong = False
            points += 1
            continue
        else:
            wrong = True
    print(points)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    ans = input()
    chef = input()
    points = 0
    i = 0
    p = 1
    for i in range(N):
        if p == 0:
            p = 1
            continue
        if ans[i] == chef[i]:
            p = 1
            points += 1
            continue
        if chef[i] != ans[i] and chef[i] != 'N':
            p = 0
            continue
    print(points)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    c = 0
    i = 0
    while i < n:
        if s2[i] == 'N':
            i += 1
            continue
        elif s1[i] != s2[i]:
            i += 2
        elif s1[i] == s2[i]:
            i += 1
            c += 1
    print(c)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    i = 0
    c = 0
    while i < n:
        if s1[i] == s2[i]:
            c = c + 1
            i = i + 1
        elif s2[i] == 'N':
            i = i + 1
        elif s1[i] != s2[i]:
            i = i + 2
    print(c)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    sol = [item for item in input()]
    ans = [item for item in input()]
    marks = 0
    for question in range(len(ans) - 1):
        answer = ans[question]
        solution = sol[question]
        if answer != solution and answer != 'N':
            ans[question] = 'N'
            ans[question + 1] = 'N'
    for yes in range(len(ans)):
        answer = ans[yes]
        solution = sol[yes]
        if answer == solution:
            marks += 1
    print(marks)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    i = 0
    c = 0
    while i < n:
        if s1[i] == s2[i]:
            c = c + 1
            i = i + 1
        elif s2[i] == 'N':
            i = i + 1
        elif s1[i] != s2[i]:
            i = i + 2
    print(c)
    t = t - 1

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    r = 0
    ranswers = input()
    answers = input()
    i = 0
    penalty = False
    while i < n:
        if penalty:
            i += 1
            penalty = False
            continue
        elif 'N' == answers[i]:
            penalty = False
        elif answers[i] == ranswers[i] and (not penalty or i == n - 1):
            r += 1
        elif answers[i] != ranswers[i]:
            penalty = True
        i += 1
    print(r)
    t -= 1
